title: PhpWebStudy Features Introduction
text1: 1. The first time you open the application, you will be prompted to enter your computer password, this is because nginx, php and other services need to use the root password to start and stop, here please enter the correct computer password, otherwise the application can not be used properly
text2: 2. After entering the application, the main interface is shown below
text3: 3. Hosts, site management, add, delete and list of sites
text4: 4. Nginx, Nginx module management, version switching, service opening and closing, configuration modification, log viewing
text5: 5. Apache, Apache module management, version switching, service opening and closing, configuration modification, log view
text6: 6. Mysql, Mysql module management, version switching, service opening and closing, configuration modification, log viewing
text7: 7. PHP, PHP module management, version switching, service opening and closing, configuration modification, log viewing, extension management
text8: 8. Memcached, Memcached module management, version switching, service on/off, log view
text9: 9. Redis, Redis module management, version switching, service opening and closing, configuration modification, log viewing
text10: 10. NodeJS, NodeJS module management, version switching, installing specific versions
text11: 11. Tools, common tools module management, SSL self-signed certificate generation, file information viewing, timestamp, text encoding and decoding
text12: 12. Setup, settings management, left module selection display, custom path for each software
